full_summary:
**Notification of Potential Tender Opportunity: Consulting Services for Short Range Radar Day Tank Replacement**

**Reference Number:** cb-8412-51380708
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** MPNWS010_ 81020

**Publication Date:** 2023-08-23

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-03 14:00:00

**Notice of Expired Tender Opportunity:** The tender opportunity announced on August 23, 2023, has expired.

**Project Overview:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites interested consultants to participate in a potential contract for the development of Plans and Specifications for the replacement of short-range radar (SRR) day tanks across the North Warning Systems (NWS) sites. The project involves the design and development of a new control and monitoring system compatible with the existing system at 36 SRR sites in the Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, and Newfoundland and Labrador.

**Security Clearance Requirements:**

To be eligible for contract award, consultants must hold an active DESIGNATED ORGANIZATION SCREENING (DOS) security clearance granted or approved by the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) at the time of closing.

**Industrial Security Program (ISP) Sponsorship:**

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) offers early access to the security clearance application process through sponsorship under its ISP. Interested consultants can begin the sponsorship request process by submitting an application through DCC’s website. DCC will provide preliminary assistance with the security clearance sponsorship process.

**Tender Notice Disclaimer:**

DCC does not guarantee the success of a sponsorship request package or a security clearance application submitted by a consultant. The processing of a sponsorship request package or a security clearance application is subject to the respective terms, conditions, and timelines of DCC’s ISP sponsorship process and the PWGSC’s security clearance granting process.

**Contact Information:**

Eric Ndayambaza
Coordinator, Contract Services
Defense Construction Canada
Eric.Ndayambaza@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
(343) 576-9347

Please note that this tender opportunity has expired.  Any questions or concerns regarding the sponsorship process or the tender notice must be addressed to the above-mentioned contact information.  Only qualified and eligible consultants who meet the security clearance requirements will be considered for the contract award.  The Department of National Defence (DND) and Defence Construction Canada (DCC) reserve the right to reject any bid
